OpenWeather.dsc: Provides current weather data for any location including over 200,000 cities.
OpenWeather.limit: Free tier allows 60 calls per minute.

WeatherAPI.dsc: Offers real-time weather data and forecasts for cities worldwide.
WeatherAPI.limit: Free tier allows 1,000 calls per month.

WeatherStack.dsc: Delivers real-time weather information for global locations with historical data options.
WeatherStack.limit: Free tier allows 250 calls per month.
